amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds appropriated by the Act from being used by the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation to enforce or implement the "Settlement Agreement By and Among UAL Corporation and all Direct and Indirect Subsidiaries and Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation", dated April 22, 2005.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 185 (Roll no. 309).
